definitions: a person who gives hugs or is fond of hugging

examples.text: he's a hugger, and even the president is not off limits
I can remember a few close friends who were particularly good huggers

shortDefinitions: person who is fond of hugging

definitions: a person who shows excessive and single-minded interest in a specified cause or objective

examples.text: call me a tree hugger, but the devastation we humans exact on the earth is atrocious
the gun huggers keep passing more and more extreme gun carry bills

shortDefinitions: person who shows excessive interest in something
